description: Creamy, colourful and delicious, these fruity frozen yoghurt pops have it all. Make this easy recipe at home for a healthier snack the whole family will love.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Fruity Yoghurt Pops Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids light meal & snack,Kids snack,Kids,Fresh Food Kids

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk yoghurt and honey in a small bowl until smooth and combined.
Layer fruit and yoghurt mixture in 6 x 1/3-cup capacity iceblock moulds.
Insert wooden iceblock sticks, then freeze for 8 hours or overnight until set. Serve.
